availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Gibbs (Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, saddler and farmer.)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, saddler and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mariah January Gibbs in Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, on June 15, 1842. Father of Mary Jeanette Gibbs Lovell, George S. Gibbs, Ann L. Gibbs, William Gibbs, and Emily Gibbs. Saddler in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Farmer in Muhlenberg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 255A.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County Marriages, Film 000557316, p. 28.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County Marriages, Film 000557317, p. 179.
